mapper.update:
UPDATE weixin_fans_all_count
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
male = #{male,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
female = #{female,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
chinese = #{chinese,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
not_chinese = #{notChinese,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
cancel = #{cancel,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
lang_ch = #{langCh,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
lang_other = #{langOther,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
net_growth = #{netGrowth,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
new_fans = #{newFans,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_search = #{addSceneSearch,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_account_migration = #{addSceneAccountMigration,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_profile_card = #{addSceneProfileCard,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_qr_code = #{addSceneQrCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_sceneprofile_link = #{addSceneprofileLink,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_profile_item = #{addSceneProfileItem,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_paid = #{addScenePaid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_scene_others = #{addSceneOthers,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_circle_friends = #{addCircleFriends,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id , count , male , female , chinese , not_chinese , cancel , lang_ch , lang_other , net_growth , date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as create_time, date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as update_time, new_fans , add_scene_search , add_scene_account_migration , add_scene_profile_card , add_scene_qr_code , add_sceneprofile_link , add_scene_profile_item , add_scene_paid , add_scene_others, add_circle_friends from weixin_fans_all_count where 1=1
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createDateBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')

select sum(count) count, sum(male) male, sum(female) female, sum(chinese) chinese, sum(not_chinese) not_chinese, sum(cancel) cancel, sum(lang_ch) lang_ch, sum(lang_other) lang_other, sum(net_growth) net_growth, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) create_time, sum(new_fans) new_fans from weixin_fans_count where 1=1
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createDateBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')

select id , count , male , female , chinese , not_chinese , cancel , lang_ch , lang_other , net_growth , date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as create_time, date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as update_time, new_fans , add_scene_search , add_scene_account_migration , add_scene_profile_card , add_scene_qr_code , add_sceneprofile_link , add_scene_profile_item , add_scene_paid , add_scene_others, add_circle_friends from weixin_fans_all_count where create_time=(select max(create_time) from weixin_fans_all_count)

select add_scene_search , add_scene_account_migration , add_scene_profile_card , add_scene_qr_code , add_sceneprofile_link , add_scene_profile_item , add_scene_paid , add_scene_others, add_circle_friends, create_time from weixin_fans_all_count where create_time=(select max(create_time) from weixin_fans_all_count)
